DOC.brief_summary: The purpose investigation evaluate short-term , clinical performance two silicone hydrogel daily disposable contact lens .
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Evaluation Two Silicone Hydrogel Daily Disposable Contact Lenses
DOC.criteria: The subject must read , understand , sign STATEMENT OF INFORMED CONSENT receive fully execute copy form . The subject must appear able willing adhere instruction set forth clinical protocol . The subject must ( include ) 18 39 year age . The subject must adapt wearer spherical soft contact lenses eye . That , subject must wear habitual lens least five ( 5 ) day per week eight ( 8 ) hour per day wear least 30 day immediately precede study . The subject must vertexcorrected distance refraction allow plano overrefraction available contact lens power 0.50 6.00 Diopters ( D ) eye . The subject must refractive astigmatism , present , less equal 1.00 D eye . The subject must best correct visual acuity 20/25 good eye . Currently pregnant breastfeeding ( subject become pregnant study discontinue ) . Any ocular systemic allergy disease may interfere contact lens wear . Any autoimmune disease use medication , may interfere contact lens wear . Entropion , ectropion , extrusion , chalazia , recurrent stye , glaucoma , history recurrent corneal erosion , aphakia . Any previous , plan , ocular interocular surgery ( e.g. , radial keratotomy , photorefractive keratectomy ( PRK ) , laserassisted situ keratomileusis ( LASIK ) , etc. ) . Any grade 3 great slit lamp finding ( e.g. , edema , corneal neovascularization , corneal staining , tarsal abnormality , conjunctival injection ) FDA classification scale , previous history sign contact lensrelated corneal inflammatory event ( e.g. , past peripheral ulcer round peripheral scar ) , ocular abnormality may contraindicate contact lens wear . Any ocular infection . Any corneal distortion result previous hard rigid gas permeable contact lens wear . Monovision , multifocal , toric , extend wear contact lens correction . Participation contact lens lens care product clinical trial within 14 day prior study enrollment . History binocular vision abnormality strabismus likely affect successful contact lens wear . Any infectious disease ( e.g. , hepatitis , tuberculosis ) contagious immunosuppressive disease ( e.g. , HIV ) selfreport .
